Description: A short description of what the mine deployer tool is used for. I.e. it places a mine which is laser triggered (meaning it detonates when its laser beam detects an enemy) and it has a shape charge functionality (meaning that the force of the explosion is focused in a certain direction rather than spreading evenly in all directions.)

French.Translation:
Explosion à activation par laser
Charge directionnelle

Italian.Translation:
Esplosione a innesco laser
Impatto direzionato

Spanish.Translation:
Explosión activada por láser
Carga hueca

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation:
Explosão acionada por laser
Alcance direcionado

Polish.Translation:
Wybuch wywoływany przez laser
Ładunek kumulacyjny

Japanese.Translation:
レーザー式爆発
偏向火薬

Chinese_Traditional.Translation:
雷射觸發爆炸
定向進攻

Chinese_Simplified.Translation:
激光触发爆炸
定向爆开

name: GearCategory.MineDeployerDescription
